ps.ptxt: Back-up light switch (M/T model) or transmission range sensor (A/T model) faulty

action.ptxt: Check back-up light switch or transmission range sensor referring to Back Up Light Switch Inspection:Petrol Engine Model , Back Up Light Switch Inspection:Diesel Engine Model , Transmission Range Sensor Inspection and Adjustment:4 A/T or Transmission Range Sensor Inspection and Adjustment:5 A/T .
